healthdata.org covid19 testing observations and predictions

Source: R/healthdata_projections_data.R
healthdata_testing_data.Rd

These are time-series data that forecaset testing quantities for US state and selected additional countries or regions. The data are those used here https://covid19.healthdata.org/projections.

healthdata_testing_data()

Source

  • https://ihmecovid19storage.blob.core.windows.net/latest/ihme-covid19.zip

References

  • https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.03.27.20043752v1

See also

  • http://www.healthdata.org/covid

  • http://www.healthdata.org/covid/updates

  • http://www.healthdata.org/covid/faqs

Other data-import: acaps_government_measures_data(), apple_mobility_data(), beoutbreakprepared_data(), cdc_aggregated_projections(), cdc_excess_deaths(), cdc_social_vulnerability_index(), coronadatascraper_data(), coronanet_government_response_data(), cov_glue_lineage_data(), cov_glue_newick_data(), cov_glue_snp_lineage(), covidtracker_data(), descartes_mobility_data(), ecdc_data(), economist_excess_deaths(), eu_data_cache_data(), financial_times_excess_deaths(), google_mobility_data(), government_policy_timeline(), healthdata_mobility_data(), healthdata_projections_data(), jhu_data(), jhu_us_data(), kff_icu_beds(), nytimes_county_data(), oecd_unemployment_data(), owid_data(), param_estimates_published(), test_and_trace_data(), us_county_geo_details(), us_county_health_rankings(), us_healthcare_capacity(), us_hospital_details(), us_state_distancing_policy(), usa_facts_data(), who_cases()

Author

Sean Davis seandavi@gmail.com

Examples

res = healthdata_mobility_data()
res

#>    mobility_data_type mobility_composite location_name date

#>  5 observed                        -13.0 Global        2020-02-12
#>  6 observed                        -13.0 Global        2020-02-13
#>  7 observed                        -13.1 Global        2020-02-14
#>  8 observed                        -13.1 Global        2020-02-15
#>  9 observed                        -13.0 Global        2020-02-16
#> 10 observed                        -13.0 Global        2020-02-17
#> # … with 128,300 more rows
summary(res)

#>  mobility_data_type mobility_composite location_name           date           
#>  Length:128310      Min.   :-99.647    Length:128310      Min.   :2020-02-08
